Единственная в своем роде! Геймплей затягивает, графика на уровне, если вам надоели игры по-типу "новых" Call Of Duty то, эта игра для вас!

So  I will now edit my review since matchmaking has since been fixed.

DBD is a very easy game to get into and it will scare the absolute crap outta you the first couple of times playing, less so later on but it can still surprise you.

Pros
-Good idea for a game
-Great gameplay for both survivor and killer
-Unique skill & point system
-Character customisation
-The use of offerings which is a nice way of voting for certain conditions on the various maps

Cons
-Sometimes the controls do not feel as responsive as I would like but is acceptable enough to not actually become a problem.
-Feels like it could do with a few more game modes after a while
-New DLC seems to give a killer an advantage

I think this is a decent game and it is worth while trying now that you can actually play online AND with your friends. It will feel like more could be done in some places but the devs are quite active and do seem to interact with the community for help. For this they get extra points in my book.
Отличная игра для людей, которые играли в догонялки в школьных коридорах. Теперь же вы можете отыграться на детских обидах и замочить тех самых школяров.
Medsistra pityshara

Este juego tiene muchos pros y contras, el juego aunque algo sencillo se vuelve muy adictivo (más si vas con amigos). De momento enfrenta problemas con algunos glitches y el matchmaking, pero si te llega a gustar el juego, es algo aguantable.

Me gusta el juego aunque esta desequilibrado y los matchmakings son descompensados tambien.Pero tiene varios puntos a su favor ya sea la banda sonora o que se un juego de supervivencia en equipo llevado al extremo.

黎明杀鸡这款游戏很有趣，如果喜欢这种类型游戏的朋友请不要错过。

PS：请加密存档，好多改档的人通过作弊快速获得技能。

Pros of DBD:

-Scary.
-Immersive.
-Graphics are pretty good.
-Gameplay/plot overall is a great idea.

You should really buy this game because it is really good tbh even with the cons, it's still a very much playable and enjoyable game.
I really love this game but there are some things that annoy me about it.

Cons of DBD:

-Killer campers, I literally hate people who camp around the hooks, generators or the gates and make it impossible for anyone to help their teamates, nearly every round I play theres a killer who camps around those areas above. [To stop this you could have it so the killer takes damage from staying around those areas for too long or for being too close].

-Matchmaking, right this is so annoying but is absolutely brilliant when it actually works, the game can never find a match straight away and even after 10+ tries it still can't find a match. *Please fix*

-I've recently had the glitch where my character is white and/or the player model itself starts to become really long and weird. I've also had the glitch where my character was jumping into the ground and I was unable to hide anywhere or do anything.

Playtime 25.08.16: 8 Hours
No match found when find the room party with friends (4 players) and click the button ready often. Pls change to press once until find the room. TY

Вашему вниманию предоставляется игра всего за 499 рублей БЕЗ багов, смс и регистрации. Отличный баланс в игре будет щекотать ваш пукан каждый раунд, а отличная работа ловушек поможет утеплить ваш вигвам. Игра шагнула технологиями вперед, ибо здесь существует навык "телепортация" (пиу-пиу-пиу, трейсер здесь).  Игра на 10/10 всем не СОВЕТУЮ.

Ну,решил я значит купить эту игру в стиме,из-за хайпа и прочей фигни.Думал что очередная сырая недоделанная игра,и хоть в чём-то это правда,но игра мне понравилась.
ПЛЮСЫ:
+Хорошая графика-ну,по крайней мере мне даже на средних она нравится внешне.
+Интересный геймплей- раньше не играл в игры по типу этой,и вообще не знаю есть ли такие,геймплей прост,за выживших держишься вместе и заводишь генераторы,за маньяка надо просто поубивать всех)))Но с друзьями играть интереснее.
+Система прокачки - хотя это и относится к геймплейной части,всё таки выделю её как отдельный критерий.Система прокачки нравится,у каждого персонажа свой уровень и своя прокачка со своими уникальными навыками.У маньяков такая же ситуация.
Минусы:
-Иногда лагают сервера - Иногда просто заходишь на какой-нибудь сервер и не можешь понять,это у тебя так лагает или с сервером проблеммы,ибо меня просто иногда берет и кидает то влево,то вправо,и таким образом от маньяка убежать довольно трудновато.
-Иногда кидает высокоранговых игроков к низкоранговым - Надеюсь это пофиксят,к примеру когда ты играешь за маньяка,к тебе могут присоедениться пара тройка игроков,с полностью прокаченными персонажами,или наоборот,маньяк гипер прокаченный,играть довольно трудно.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Вообщем,это всё что я хотел сказать,спасибо что прочитали мой обзор,и если он понравился,можете отписаться у меня в профиле))
虽然游戏是好玩，但是对笔记本太不友好了，神tm玩古墓10不卡，玩这卡的飞起，才20到30帧左右，希望官方能优化一下，对笔记本党友好一点

Dead by Daylight has had its ups and downs. This game isn't for people who get easily triggered or angry. There are a lot of shitty people here. There will be camping, looping and flashlights. But in the end it's just a game and everyone wants to have fun. 

The game design has been fixed up the years and I can say im really impressed that the game has been holding up its popularity. It's superfun playing with friends and when you finally get the hang of it you get addicted. The DLC worth bying in the beginning is Halloween, SAW and The Last Breath Chapter.
This is a very fun and exciting game for you and your friends. I would recommend it to anyone who likes to play with friends or and killing game and surviving game.
Das Spiel ist eigentlich ganz gut. Aber es gibt mittlerweile viel zu viele Camper und die Developer arbeiten an keiner Lösung. Somit wird das ganze Gameplay in einem Match zerstört.
Очень хорошая игра

(Игра хороша! Разработчики молодцы! Идея хорошая и реализация тоже, НО игра имеет целую КУЧУ БАГОВ! Разработчики, конечно, исправляют ошибки, но с каждым патчем появляются новвые баги. Ах да ------- ОПТИМАЗАЦИЯ 4% 

Вы спросите, а почему я ставлю тогда этой игре да. А дело в том, что вы ни где больше не найдете столь затягивающей, интересной, оригинальной игры. Отценка 6 из 10 только из-за багов. Свои 450 рублей она стоит!) Комментарий был оставлен пол года назад!

07.12.16 Вышел патч, следом вышел ДЛС. Так вот, куча багов, лагов и всего другого. И да, механика с тотемами не очень.
ОПТИМИЗАЦИЯ 1%. Но все равно даю голос: ДА

If you like sitting in a lobby more then playing the game then buy it. Match making is still broken... Adding new content to a game is all well and good but first make sure the basic features actually work. It's not a compatibility issue - everyone is affected. Finding a match is a random game of who clicks at the right time. It can take anywhere from 30 seconds to 20 minutes.

Kurz zur Erklärung des Spiels : Auf einer von insgesamt 4 verschieden Maps (MacMillan Anwesen, Coldwind-Farm, Autohaven-Schrottplatz und The Asylum) treten vier Überlebende gegen einen von einem anderen Spieler gesteuerten Killer an ( Hillbilly, Fallensteller, Geist oder Krankenschwester), die alle über verschiedene Fähigkeiten verfügen. Ziel des Spiels ist es für die Übelebenden 5 oder 4 (variiert nach Spieleranzahl) Generatoren zu aktivieren und somit die Ausgangstore mit Energie zu versorgen um zu entkommen. Ziel des Killers hingegen ist es alle Überlebenden zu finden, fangen und an Haken zu töten. Soweit die Grundidee des Spiels.

Positiv:
-Das Spiel ist sehr atmosphärisch und erzeugt eine super Unwohl-Stimmung
-GENIALER Soundtrack
-Detaillierte Charaktere (Sowohl Killer als auch Überlebende)
-Hoher Wiederspielwert da jedes Online-Match einzigartig ist
-Ständige Updates und Patches - kostenlos
-Survive with your Friends- Spaß mit Freunden haben


Negativ:
-Teilweise noch recht unbalanced
-Maps sind vom Grundprinzip immer gleich


An dieser Stelle: Klare Kaufempfelung von meiner Seite. Das Spiel macht echt Spaß und die ständigen Updates erweitern diesen noch. Genial!

Хорошая игра
9/10hours waiting n1ce one

The gameplay is fine,the game is always getting updates,developers are working hard,but from my point of view somehow the killers always gets the benefits,they are somehow always overpowered in some ways,which gives survivors a challenge,but still I don't think that they should let killers be so powerful.
But anyways very nice game,would recommend!
游戏玩法很好，玩起来也很刺激。就是服务器太差，匹配三次有两次进不了房间，而且经常玩一半服务器挂了所有人退出游戏。

Balance, connection/server and data are all negative here, first of all, the game has NO dedicated servers, heavily relies(I mean only relies) on killers as hosts' having good connection or you just die from hits far far away, and and constantly get lagg spikes in the game, when you're running when clearly where you're going is an ubstructed path only for a wall to pop in front of you and as a result get caught, anti-cheat ssytem is a joke and only works for profiles, the paid cheats are not blocked!

All your data are locally saved thus people can cheat them,

If you're hoping for balance, don't put too much hope as the game extremely favor's killers in almost every aspect and feature except numbers 4v1 and window cheese w/c is still not indefinite and are not everywhere, if you want to play a one-man team killer simulator, this might itch that cliche, speaking of gameplay after a few days after all that thrill, excitement and all that jazz fades out, it get's pretty repetitive and boring now especially as the killer, 

About the price, by now I know you got a feeling that it's over-priced(or along the lines of), not paying for servers since people host it themselves and not even servers for people's data except what comes free from steam. needless to say more.

Great game 

This game has a real good horror feeling to it, one guy is the killer and has to kill the survivors by hanging them on giant hooks. On the other hand the survivors need to fix 5 generators for the exit gate to be powered so they can escape from the killer. 

The game has had some bugs here and there but the developers are definitely there and trying to solve them as quickly as possible. 

Overall: Great game for €20, escpecially if you have some friends to play it with, i'll give it a 8/10.

At first this game was fun and exhilirating. It was really fun to play with friends and random people. But now, it's turn into a game where all people do is farm points by camping, getting caught by it, making the devs include an anticheat patch, and all the patch does is glitch people some more, and now the new killer they put out is an ULTIMATE camper killer, which really just ruins the whole point of no killer camping. So, *claps* Congrats, dev. You turned a game with a bright future into nothing.

이게임의 재미는 보증합니다. 진짜 재밌습니다. 
살인마던 생존자던  게임의 분위기 bgm 등이 어우러져 긴장감을 만들어냅니다.

게임은 게임내의 여러 기믹을 이용해 탈출하거나 / 생존자를 제물로 바치는게 목적입니다.
다만 인디게임이다보니 버그도 많습니다. 살인자나 생존자가 오브젝트에 끼인다거나 생존자가 다나가거나 죽었는데 게임이 안끝난다거나 검은화면속에 같힌다던가 하는 버그는 식상합니다.

또한 벨런스에도 큰 문제가있습니다. 다른분들도 같은지적을 하셨지만 생각보다 벨런스에 문제가 큽니다.

특정 살인자(라고쓰고 은신마라 읽는다)는 특정맵에서 그냥 나가는게 정신건강에 이로울정도로 농락당하기 쉽상입니다. 생존자가 일정이상 숙련자일경우 특정살인자를 완전 무력화에 가깝게 농락합니다. 종소리가 울리면 긴장이 풀어지며 릴렉스한게임을 할수있습니다.

일명 인성존 : 세이프티존의 존재가 살인마를 무력화 하는 경향이 있습니다. 
이미너프된 창문넘기도 특정구역에서 몇시간이던 살인마를 피할수있도록 되어있는게 문제입니다.
바리케이트처럼 1회성이라면 모르지만 그냥 한군데서 넘어다니는 것만으로 안전과 점수를 확보할수있는 부분은 해결해야 할듯 합니다.

그리고 신맵은 정신병원인가요? 바리케이트 공장인가요? 내부에 바리케이트가 한걸음 걸을때마다 나오네요 ㅋㅋㅋㅋ
너스 외에는 못하게하려는건가요? 

개발자들도 이런 문제를 빠르게 수정해주는 모습을 보여주고있으니 기대하고있겠습니다.

做杀手容错率太高，做人太难玩，发现鬼移速太快，感觉应该只有幽灵杀手有高移速（1.1-1.2）现形（1.2-1.4）隐身，陷阱，电锯杀手（1.1-1.2），护士（0.8-0.9），人类移速（0.95-1.05），夹子放在人身下应该永远可拆，守人问题严重，路人局援助基本就是摆设(救人代价太高)，鬼跨越障碍应该加快，拆夹子60-80%提示全距离，触发按距离给提示，拆钩子60-80%按距离给提示，距离外听不见，距离一定要大（半径在地图的四分之一多一点），修电机的速度应该和人挂上死亡的时间一样长（不自我脱钩挣扎点满），游戏优化和BUG优化一下，鬼应该出生在中心建筑里，人类不用祭品应该一起出生在地图的一个发电机旁边不远（现在鬼默认找最远的发电机），地窖应该随机设置在较空旷地带给屠夫一点反应时间且逃生者身上挨刀应该有个四到八秒的准备逃生时间抓不出来，没挨刀跳时可以抓出来

I hate how much I love this game. This game use to be and somewhat still is my go too game but it's becoming harder and harder for me to hit that play button because I know how upset i'm going to be within a few minutes. There are a lot of people giving this game a good review but they don't have that many hours in and that's very misleading. You'll notice the people that's been here for a long while are all changing our reviews to negative, and for a good reason. This game use to be all about the game play and it was one of a kind, but that was also the problem, it's the only game of it's kind. Over the past year they have created cross-platform to include consoles and... mobile. That's right, mobile. Oh, and switch. Now, one might be wondering how can you compete with someone on PC if you are playing from a switch or your phone. Well, the answer to that will be in why everyone is leaving this game. The devs keep coming out with the worst updates that no one is asking for. They have created a store and are constantly pushing out new cosmetics and updating different looks instead of fixing the issues people are upset about. Yes, you can disable crossplay but be ready to wait 30 minutes for one game, just to have a killer camp you and teammates that don't know what they are doing so you just die. When you do play crossplatform you can notice huge lag spikes. When you are looking at the forms of what players are upset about it's mostly the lag issues from crossplatform servers. How did they fix this? They made the hitboxs huge for the killers, and changed the hud? They also changed up camera angles and other things no one has ever asked for in the game. I truly feel bad for new players coming into this game, playing it and getting scared, and having fun because they are enjoying the worst period of this game. Oh how I wish they could of played it in the past, when it was all about the mind games, and tricking each other and having to really work for the win. I hope to revisit this review in the future and change it back to a thumbs up, but as of right now it's a hard thumbs down.

This is not a bad game. The concept is original and, when the stars align, fun. What irritates me is the whole character progression system, un-fun options being the best options, and the infrequency of bug fixes.

Personally, I think this game would have been better without the "growing characters". Every survivor is the same starting out, you have to spend hours upon hours in-game to get anything that makes them unique. New players have no tools outside of fundamental gameplay that lets them contribute meaningfully.

Killers, on the other hand, can either be a joke or a terror, based entirely on how much time the player has invested.

As far as I have been able to tell, camping a survivor as the killer is your best strategy, especially as the game's best killer, Trapper. Survivors have no way of offensively threatening the Killer or communicating with random players, so incoming help usually does little but change who's dying. Conversely, the best strategy for a survivor is to leave the dying player alone due to the above. There is no being a hero unless your killer also wants to have fun.

The dev team doesn't seem particularly interested in fixing the multitude of bugs plaguing DbD, many of which have no reason to exist. One example springs to mind, where a killer's facial model will clip into first person view, interfering with vision based on which killer is dealing with it. This has been an issue for months.

If you must get this, find it on sale. Otherwise, look elsewhere until this gets cleaned up.

I recently staretd this game after watching some streamers' playing through Twitch and Afreeca TV. It totally attracted my interests and enjoyed playing this game until I found out this game has a pretty nerdy mathing system. 

I was playing a 6lv(18rank) killer and matched with 4 of 50lv (1 rank, the highest rank of this game,) 3 games in a row. 

I said, "3 GAMES IN A ROW!!!!!!!!!!"

Since I played this game not as much as the high-ranked players, the only thing I could do during the whole time was running after them and I couldn't even hit one, lol. The problem was that all of them had 4 of 3lv perks and I had nothing. It was even IMPOSSIBLE to just chase them. After the game, all of the survivors said, "u're cute," which meant I was just being a darn sexy doll for them to play with.

Now? all of my interest to play this game is gone. Don't play or start this game unless you're a darn good newbie to beat all the high-ranked players without any perks. Queuing system should be fixed first than any other item/perk/new character patches.
